title: [Tuts Plus] Mastering Fantasy Design with Adobe Illustrator and
description:
[Tuts Plus] Mastering Fantasy Design with Adobe Illustrator and Poser-KTR
=========================================================================


PUBLISHER....: Tuts Plus                 
LANGUAGE......: ENGLISH 
AUTHOR.......:  Nastasia Peters
RUNTIME......: 1.7H 0M


In this course, you'll learn how to use both Adobe Illustrator and Poser to create a cool fantasy design illustration. You'll get a quick introduction to Poser and the tools you need to know, and then you'll be taken into Adobe Illustrator to create the finished illustration, with many tips and tricks learned along the way.



Topics include:

Introduction
1.1 Introduction


2.Conceptualization1 lesson
2.1Creating a Reference in Photoshop


3.Creating a Reference in Poser4 lessons
3.1Introduction to Poser
3.2Customizing a 3D Model in Poser
3.3Posing 3D Models in Poser
3.4Creating a Background and Light Source


4.Sketching in Adobe Photoshop4 lessons
4.1Outline Sketch
4.2Background Sketch
4.3Character Sketch
4.4Shading the Sketch


5.Creating Line Work in Adobe Illustrator6 lessons
5.1Tools and Setup
5.2Background Line Art
5.3Character Line Art
5.4Using Live Paint
5.5Choosing Base Colors
5.6Creating Color Holds


6.Light Source, Highlights and Shading4 lessons
6.1Using the Light Source
6.2Shading
6.3Highlights
6.4Final Touches


7.Conclusion
7.1Final Thoughts
